attributes.action: Oppose the construction of a waste incinerator in the Lee Mill/Ivybridge area of Devon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
1. 275, 000 tonnes of waste incinerated at the proposed site
2. 17 tonnes of CO2, every hour,  7 days a week belching into the air
3. 200-300 heavy waste delivery lorries choking up the A38
4. Heavy metals, dioxins and nano particles contaminating our clean air
5. 480% rise in carcinoma incidence
6. Toxic fly ash in the ground and river Yealm
7. The value of my/local properties reduced by at least 10%

Therefore I object in the strongest terms to this abomination being built in the Ivybridge/Lee Mill area
